title: What is this red ribbon behind my icon on my profile?
body:
Hey guys,

I was wondering what the red ribbon thing behind my icon is. some other people don't have it. 

Thanks in advance

replies.body: *Lew* is correct, this looks to just be part of your Gold profile border for your performance last season. ^.^
It looks like that is the profile border for getting to gold last ranked season.
